alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 6:09AM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of a dusting in the lowest elevations and up to 5 inches in higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph out of the southwest, shifting north on Tuesday afternoon. * WHERE...Northwest Deserts including Kingman, Dolan Springs, Wikieup, and the Hualapai Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Potentially hazardous road conditions where snow accumulates on any roadways. High wind gusts coupled with falling snow could result in low visibility due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
